componentDescription: A component for selecting colors, providing predefined options, custom input, and recent color history.

id.description: An optional unique identifier for the component.

name.description: The name attribute for the input element, useful for form submissions.

label.description: The label text to display for the color picker.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text displayed when no color is selected.

helperText.description: Helper text displayed below the color picker.

value.description: The controlled color value of the picker.

defaultValue.description: The initial color value when the component is uncontrolled.

onChange.description: Callback function triggered when the color value changes, providing the new color.

onChangeComplete.description: Callback function triggered when the color selection is complete (e.g., mouse up after drag).

views.description: Custom styles to apply to different parts of the ColorPicker.

size.description: The size variant of the color picker (e.g., small, medium, large).

shape.description: The shape variant of the color picker (e.g., rounded, square).

variant.description: The visual style variant of the color picker (e.g., filled, outlined).

error.description: Indicates if the color picker is in an error state.

isDisabled.description: If true, the color picker will be disabled and non-interactive.

isReadOnly.description: If true, the color picker will be read-only and its value cannot be changed by the user.

predefinedColors.description: An array of predefined color objects for quick selection.

showCustomInput.description: If true, displays an input field for users to enter custom color values.

showRecentColors.description: If true, displays a section for recently selected colors.

colorFormat.description: Specifies the preferred format for color values (e.g., HEX, RGB, HSL).

maxRecentColors.description: The maximum number of recent colors to display.

isOpen.description: Controls the open/closed state of the color picker dropdown.

onOpen.description: Callback function triggered when the color picker dropdown is opened.

onClose.description: Callback function triggered when the color picker dropdown is closed.

closeOnSelect.description: If true, the dropdown will close automatically after a color is selected.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element for accessibility purposes.

aria-describedby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object for accessibility purposes.
